title: FS - T3 Turkey Reds - all sold
author: jayshum

posts.post_title: FS - T3 Turkey Reds - all sold
posts.post_content:
The following T3 Turkey Reds are available.  There are no pinholes or visible creases with great eye appeal and nice corners. Additional information for each card is below.  Prices include insured Priority Mail shipping with net amount to me via PayPal or check.  Email me at [url]jandcristi@verizon.net[/url] to purchase or make offers.  Jay

43 - Out at Third - small amount of paper loss on back, left border of card but no missing text - $350 SOLD

45 - Jordan & Herzog at First - some staining around the border on the front, 2 small spots on right border where it looks like color was added, 13 or so check marks in pen on the back, all text readable - $275 SOLD

46 - Safe at Third - a number of spots around the front border that look like they had some color added but still overall great eye appeal, clean back - $275 SOLD
Very nice card and amazing pack/ship job. Thanks again Jay!
